original_text: And when Abner was returned to Hebron, Joab took him aside in the gate to speak with him quietly, and smote him there under the fifth rib, that he died, for the blood of Asahel his brother.
korean_text: 아브넬이 헤브론으로 돌아오매 요압이 더불어 조용히 말하려는 듯이 그를 데리고 성문 안으로 들어가 거기서 배를 찔러 죽이니 이는 자기의 동생 아사헬의 피로 말미암음이더라

sentences.original_text: And when Abner was returned to Hebron
Joab took him aside in the gate
and smote him there under the fifth rib
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에서 그의 다섯 번째 갈빗대 아래를 쳐서

sentences.original_text: for the blood of Asahel his brother
